I20041207-0800

Another way to reproduce: regex search for "\s" in text file
"testing
testing
"

The problem only appears with a Windows (\r\n line delimiters) document. Not
reproducible with Unix nor MacOS 9 line delimiters. In contrast to the
Find/Replace dialog, File Search does not produce an exception.
Even if it depends on bug 44766 we should at least fix the IAE.

Fixed in HEAD.
Available in builds > 20050114
Verified in I20050217-2000 with test cases from comment 0 and comment 2.
